objects.text:
• Iconic Air Max 1 silhouette
• Visible Air-Sole cushioning
• Premium white and mint design
• Durable mesh upper

product_details.name: Nike Air Max 1 'Fresh Mint' - Classic Comfort Meets Modern Style
product_details.description:
• Iconic Air Max 1 silhouette with premium construction
• Fresh white and mint green color combination
• Durable mesh and synthetic upper for breathability
• Visible Air-Sole unit for legendary cushioning
• Padded collar for enhanced comfort
• Classic waffle outsole for reliable traction
• Signature Nike Swoosh branding in mint green
• Lightweight foam midsole for all-day comfort
• Versatile design suitable for both casual wear and light activities
• Limited edition colorway perfect for collectors

banner_details:
The banner features a dynamic and modern layout designed to promote a sneaker product. The composition is divided into a light upper section and a dark lower half. A bold and impactful heading (id: "heading") introduces the product, followed by a vibrant subheading (id: "subheading") in a green hue that highlights the edition or variant. A detailed list (id: "description") outlines key features of the product, aligned neatly to the left. On the lower left, a large circular backdrop supports the pricing information (id: "price") and an eye-catching call-to-action button (ids: "cta_button" and "cta"). The product image (id: "product_image") is prominently placed at an angle to add depth and motion. Geometric lines and circles in soft green tones add a visual rhythm that leads the viewer across the design without clutter.

**Color Palette:**
- Mint Green: #78C256
- Charcoal Gray: #333333
- Light Gray: #F5F5F5
- White: #FFFFFF
- Medium Gray (text elements): #444444
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant color palette dominated by shades of green, white, and grey. The lime green (#7AC143) overlays the lower and upper Nike swoosh areas, creating a bold yet refreshing visual appeal. Light grey (#A7A9AC) is used on the mid-upper panels and lace eyelets, blending seamlessly with the white mesh (#FFFFFF) on the toe and collar, ensuring breathability and clean aesthetics. The midsole is a neutral off-white (#F2F2F2), balancing the brightness of the green, while black (#000000) is subtly applied on the outsole for grounding contrast. These colors unify to create a sleek, sporty, and modern vibe.
